data.message: Oh man. I am thrilled! We're, my husband, kids and I,  moving to Hawaii and my blind father in law is staying in Texas with his daughter. We see them very often so he has the ability to in a way watch them grow. Now being so far away he can still be able to enjoy our photos and statuses for the times we can't always be in the phone with him. Great job Facebook

replies.message: We're very happy to hear that, Hokulani. Thanks for being part of our community! -Azaria
